duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading a sales team to achieve revenue and growth targets by establishing sales goals and monitoring team achievements.
Coaching AEs on specific skills and industry knowledge, ensuring they are equipped to succeed in their current role.
Serving as a key driver for setting/surpassing sales objectives and working with key team members in product, marketing, and services.
Providing accurate weekly, monthly and quarterly forecasts.
Attracting and retaining all-star account executives through hiring, training, coaching, appraising, rewarding, and motivating.
Participating in the sales process on key accounts and maintaining positive customer relationships.
Serving on General Markets subcommittees to build value and efficiencies for clients and prospects.
Ensuring adoption and consistent use of key sales tech stack applications like Salesforce, Salesloft, Seismic, Consensus.
